Reviews.Title: “Fair deal - kind service, perfect location, small room”

Reviews.Content: hotel blocks taksim square found restaurants shops bars cafes safe walk late night pleasant walks main turistic attractions convenient stay arrived checkin time ready hotel store luggage closed lockers left documents valuables safely day bad noisy hotel close elevator hear guests employees coming corridor stayed inside sleeping hours visit outside

Reviews.Content: coldness experience elite world prestige hotel sleep coat dont operate heater cold rainy winter nights charge including bottle water table hundreds decent hotels taksim reasonable price turkish hospitality hotel shame istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Hell.. Do not stay there!”

Reviews.Content: trip appeared hell hotel checking terrible smell cigarettes nonsmoking shocked seeing garbage bin smelled cigarettes ive move fortune bin family decided city days hotel manager offered help booking transfer hotel paid 6 half driver stopped saying change car join 50 people 40 minutes desperate negotiations threatening sue finally destination current car ourselves minor unpleasant happened

Reviews.Content: hotel ok decent tried breakfast nor restaurant placed hotels street minor annoyances 1 soundproofing hear phone ringing baby crying doors slamming cleaners morning 2 2nd september 9pm ac reception feedback afterwards call 11pm feedback call told anymore summer istanbul thats shut ac window rom warm comments
